subject: Golf
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Bill Haas survived a three-hole sudden-death playoff against Hunter Mahan to win the Tour Championship, but he was astonished to learn that he had also won the FedEx Cup.
snippet: Bill Haas survived a three-hole sudden-death playoff against Hunter Mahan to win the Tour Championship, but he was astonished to learn that he had also won the FedEx Cup.
